name: exim_exporter
description: Prometheus exporter for the exim4 mail transport server.
full_description:
See [exim_exporter](https://github.com/gvengel/exim_exporter) project on Github for more details.

## Usage
To enable full functionality the exporter needs access to exim's log files, spool directory, and process list. For example, if you were running your MTA in a container named exim4, usage might look something like:

```
docker run 
  -p 9636:9636 \
  -v /var/log/exim4:/var/log/exim4 \
  -v /var/spool/exim4:/var/spool/exim4 \
  --pid container:exim4 \
  --name exim_exporter \
  gvengel/exim_exporter
```

Also see the provided [docker-compose](https://github.com/gvengel/exim_exporter/blob/master/docker-compose.yml) example.
